it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.util

Class ByteTlvAttribute

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.util.TlvAttribute
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.util.ByteTlvAttribute
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtensionHeaderOption, Icmp6Option, TlvOption

    public class ByteTlvAttribute
extends TlvAttribute
    Type-Length-Value (TLV) attribute with a 8-bit type and 8-bit length.

    The length field in TLV is the length of the value. The getTotalLength() method returns the length of the entire attribute (i.e. value length + 2).
